title: Source-Based Information Processing Strategies for Strengthening Comprehensive Scientific Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Scientific Paper Structure and Academic Writing Principles
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning environment utilizing smartphone-accessible materials, with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify key information from various scientific materials with over 80% precision
Learners can systematically organize selected information into an outline following a logical flow
Learners can write an integrated essay of over 500 characters connecting scientific concepts and data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
